did.abstract: Letters from friends discussing social matters and from Confederate soldiers describing the battle of Chickamauga and trials of deserters. Also included are letters between Robert T. Clayton in Bluefields, Nicaragua, and W.R. Grace and Co., of New York, discussing the price of rubber; a letter from Robert T. Clayton concerning the Republican Party in Georgia; and information on the Clayton family.

Clayton concerning the Republican Party in Georgia; and information on the Clayton family.
